00010 #ifndef PAGER_H
00011 #define PAGER_H
00012 
00013 #include <list>
00014 #include <vector>
00015 #include <boost/noncopyable.h>
00016 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00017 
00018 #include "blockmanager_fwd.h"
00019 
00020 NS_IZENELIB_AM_BEGIN
00021 
00023 template <unsigned npages_>
00024 class lru_pager : private boost::noncopyable
00025 {
00026     typedef std::list<int_type> list_type;
00027 
00028     boost::shared_ptr<list_type> history;
00029     std::vector<list_type::iterator> history_entry;
00030 
00031 public:
00032     enum { n_pages = npages_ };
00033 
00034     lru_pager() : history(new list_type), history_entry(npages_)
00035     {
00036         for (unsigned_type i = 0; i < npages_; i++)
00037             history_entry[i] = history->insert(history->end(), static_cast<int_type>(i));
00038     }
00039     ~lru_pager() { }
00040     int_type kick()
00041     {
00042         return history->back();
00043     }
00044     void hit(int_type ipage)
00045     {
00046         assert(ipage < (int_type)npages_);
00047         assert(ipage >= 0);
00048         history->splice(history->begin(), *history, history_entry[ipage]);
00049     }
00050     void swap(lru_pager & obj)
00051     {
00052         boost::shared_ptr<list_type> tmp = obj.history;
00053         obj.history = history;
00054         history = tmp;
00055         std::swap(history_entry, obj.history_entry);
00056     }
00057 };
00058 
00059 
00060 NS_IZENELIB_AM_END
00061 
00062 #endif
